'''Pine Wood'''  is obtained by cutting down Pine. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Pine Trees are found in [[Dragonspine]], [[Wuwang Hill]], some parts of [[Minlin]], [[Ritou]], near the [[Golden House]] and the [[City of Mondstadt]], and outside the [[Kamisato Estate]].
